cwitools.science.fwhm2sigma¶

cwitools.science.fwhm2sigma(fwhm)¶

Convert a gaussian Full-Width at Half Maximum to a standard deviation.

Parameters

fwhm (float) – Full-Width at Half Maximum of a Gaussian function.

Returns

The standard deviation of the equivalent Gaussian.

Return type

float
